channel.title: How do i make people donate to me where does the money go?
channel.description: ok guys im 89% done with my server i already set a static ip so it wont change or nuthin,but i got one problem how do i make people donate to me and where does the money go?

item.title: How do i make people donate to me where does the money go?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:418333”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=520878.msg3784487#msg3784487 date=1318744632]

pay to win servers make me want to cry

yep, but if u run a vps u can’t else
[/quote]Not true, there are plenty of fair ways to implement donation systems. I just think being able to directly buy better weapons or other items to use against normal players is extremely… stupid.

Examples of good donation rewards (relatively, I don’t think real donation rewards are required. These are just some of the ‘fairest’ ones):

[ul][li]Donator rank[/li]
[li]Untradable aesthetic rewards (meaning items that look good, but don’t really give any other advantage)[/li][/ul][/quote]

i play a server where i donated, and the donor cape makes u have inf pray and gives awesome bonuses

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make people donate to me where does the money go?

Examples of good donation rewards (relatively, I don’t think real donation rewards are required. These are just some of the ‘fairest’ ones):

item.title: How do i make people donate to me where does the money go?
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

Well its not a good idea to make them donate…

And they send it through paypal which requires a credit/debit/check card at paypal.com
All they would do is enter your email and enter the amount they are willing to give you and they send it. Its almost instant.

I belive you can take your paypal money and put it into your bank not sure how that works

You could make a command like ::donate which takes them to your donation page on your forum or something.

Hope this helped

Read full topic
